keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued to R. Silvia on August 15, 2019, commanding their appearance on August 20, 2019.
The subpoena demands the production of all materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein, including text messages, emails, social media messages, documents, and notes.
The investigation involves alleged violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 371, 1001, and 1519 (conspiracy, false statements, and destruction of evidence).
The subpoena includes an advice of rights, indicating the recipient may have information relevant to potential criminal liability.
The document is signed by Geoffrey S. Berman, the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York at the time.
